mapper.insert: insert into MAIL (SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, TO_MAIL, FROM_MAIL, SEND_DT) values ( (select NULLIF(MAX(A.seq),0)+1 from MAIL A), #{title}, #{contents}, #{toMail}, #{fromMail}, now() )
mapper.select: select SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, TO_MAIL, FROM_MAIL, TO_CHAR(SEND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS sandDt from MAIL order by SEND_DT desc
